greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n, where the difference between the number of odd parts and the number of even parts is 2.
comment: With offset 4 number of partitions of n, where the difference between the number of odd parts and the number of even parts is -2.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
maple: b:= proc(n, i, t) option remember; `if`(abs(t)>n, 0,
mathematica: a /@ Range[2, 80] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 10 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Mar 30 2014
